mapper.sql: xid, revertCode, eid, checkGoodsRecord, consignee, consigneeDate
mapper.select: SELECT g.xid,g.revertCode,e.name,g.checkGoodsRecord,g.consignee,g.consigneeDate FROM goods_information g,employee e WHERE g.eid=e.eid
mapper.insert:
insert into goods_information
xid,
revertCode,
eid,
checkGoodsRecord,
consignee,
consigneeDate,
#{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{revertcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{checkgoodsrecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update goods_information
revertCode = #{revertcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
checkGoodsRecord = #{checkgoodsrecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consigneeDate = #{consigneedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where xid = #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods_information set revertCode = #{revertcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, checkGoodsRecord = #{checkgoodsrecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consigneeDate = #{consigneedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where xid = #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
